temple_tagline: Satyam Shivam Sundaram - A sacred space for worship, spiritual growth, and divine connection with our ancient traditions
sacred_space: A Sacred Space for Divine Connection
temple_description_1: The Mahalaxmi Temple of Kolhapur is a revered center of devotion, rich in spiritual tradition, cultural significance, and community faith. For centuries, it has drawn countless devotees seeking the blessings of Goddess Mahalaxmi.
temple_description_2: The temple is constructed following ancient वास्तु शास्त्र (Vastu Shastra) principles, fostering a spiritually uplifting and harmonious atmosphere that deepens the connection between devotees and the divine.
guidance_description: Expert priests providing authentic rituals and guidance
our_deities_description: Our temple houses several deities, each with their own significance and dedicated space for worship.
temple_timings_description: Our temple follows a traditional schedule of rituals and ceremonies throughout the day.

temple_rituals.description: The temple opens for morning darshan.
First aarti of Goddess Mahalaxmi in the morning.
Performed immediately after the Kakad Aarti.
The Goddess is bathed with sacred water.
A special puja to start the day.
The Goddess receives a second ceremonial bath.

temple_rituals_continued.description: The Goddess is adorned with jewelry and garments daily.
The day ends with the aarti of the Goddess.
Final aarti before the Goddess retires for rest.
Every Friday, the Palkhi (palanquin) procession of the Goddess.

gallery_description: Glimpses of our beautiful temple, festivals, and community events.
abhishek_description: Offer your devotion at the feet of the Lord
